The Science & Story Behind It

The dual excellence of ‘Neri-Snack’ lies in its enhanced pigmentation and optimized grazing efficiency.

  • The intense, stable striping results from selective breeding for maximum pigment expression in the periostracum layer, creating both ornamental value and a marker of overall health and shell integrity.
  • The concentrated sweet flavor develops from their efficient conversion of diverse algal films into glycogen and flavor compounds, enhanced by breeding for optimal nutrient partitioning.
  • Their inability to reproduce in pure seawater while maintaining vigorous grazing activity makes them ideal for controlled urban systems where population management is essential.

In short, Striped Nerite ‘Neri-Snack’ is a visually-striking, flavor-concentrated, and ecologically-safe cultivar, the perfect fusion of form and function that brings both impeccable aquarium maintenance and gourmet garnishes to urban marine aquaculture.
